job.title: IT Project Manager
job.description: Computer Enterprises Inc is looking for a strong Project Manager who has a background in software development and has the ability to lead development teams brCEIs Managed Services practices focuses on longterm support efforts across development testing and infrastructure management arenas  Our practices seek to bring the right pricing model by extending our solutions across our delivery centers in the US India Peru and Spain  brbrResponsibilities will include the followingbr	Personal billing as Project Manager commensurate with size of practice  pipelinebr	Manage and hiring team members within geographic areabr	Training certification and productivity of team membersbr	Assist local sales group with growing the practice through presales support technical credibility assessments qualificationbr	Proposal management and development verify approach create estimates plan marketingbr	Team member scheduling works with PMs  other Ops Dirs  VPbr	PL review and oversight for the delivery group in the regionbrbrDesired Skillsbr	Previous experience managing offshore delivery teamsbr	As at least 8 years experience as a project managerbr	The ability to navigate conflict errors and unexpected roadblocks with poise and purposebr	Exposure to application management and ITILbr	Must be a team leader people are inspired to followbr	Eager to grow our service offeringbr
